CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(Service_Center__c, "Leng Kee"), "Leng Kee", IF(CONTAINS(Service_Center__c, "Sin Ming"), "Sin Ming", IF(CONTAINS(Service_Center__c, "Alexandra"), "Alexandra", IF(CONTAINS(Service_Center__c, "Fulco"), "Fulco", IF(CONTAINS(Service_Center__c, "Pandan Gardens"), "Pandan Gardens", IF(CONTAINS(Service_Center__c, "Pandan Loop"), "Pandan Loop", "Others"))))))
CustomField.label: Location
